name: Last Garden
description:
Last Garden takes the concept of a platforming game without jumping to explore the mechanics of plant growth to build platforms which will get the protagonist Clover through the stage!

Created for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam, "Genre Without Mechanic".

How to Play:

Use the 'A' key or the left arrow key to move left, use the 'D' key or the right arrow key to move right.

Use the mouse pointer to aim at a location to toss seeds. Press the left mouse button to fire the seeds.

To grow platforms, you need to deliver the seeds to the water holes. These will grow vines or roots, allowing Clover to reach new parts of the level. Seeds can bounce off walls, so look for angles!

Press Esc to exit at any time.
